text: Okay, now to module 10, very contagious issue, especially on spoofing, which is an illegal illegal activity in the financial markets and we will be talking about the legality of it or the illegal nature of it and what it actually means. But in this module we focus on market flipping, layering and spoofing price patterns and how to identify them and what type of trading strategies to deploy when you do observe them in the price ladder environment.
